Traits.Name: Presence of Dread
Traits.Content: Enemies that start their turn within 30 feet of the Hat Man must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Shadowy Resilience
Traits.Content: The Hat Man has advantage on saving throws against being incapacitated and is immune to the poisoned condition.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The Hat Man is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells: At will: minor illusion, thaumaturgy; 3/day each: fear, suggestion; 1/day each: confusion, dominate person.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Hat Man makes three attacks: one with Dark Embrace and two with Nightmares.

Actions.Name: Dark Embrace
Actions.Content: Melee Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Nightmares
Actions.Content: Melee Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) psychic damage. The target must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of their next turn as they are overwhelmed by fear and horror.

Actions.Name: Horrifying Visage (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Hat Man presents an unsettling appearance in a 40-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Creatures that fail the save are also frightened until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Soporific Mist (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Hat Man releases a thick mist in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious for 1 minute. The effect ends for a creature if it takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.
